content: {"name": "Lutheran Social Services South Side Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Franklin and Delaware County residents do not need a referral. They can visit www.lssfoodpantries.org and make registration to place an order and make an appointment for a pick-up date and time. If you need assistance, please call our help desk at 877-LSS-MEAL weekdays from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m.\nService area: Franklin County\n", "email": "", "url": "lssnetworkofhope.org/foodpantries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1460 South Champion Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "South Columbus", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9349922, "longitude": -82.9708428}, "phones": [{"number": "(877) 577-6325", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "20:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
